bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel to carry out a market access program.

actions.text: Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Lipinski.
On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 254 (Roll no. 456).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to alter contract no. GS-35F-4076D with respect to the location of data storage.

actions.text: Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Flake.
On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 228 (Roll no. 455).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to provide any benefit described in section 1001D(b)(1)(C) of the Food Security Act of 1985 to a person or legal entity if the average adjusted gross income of the person or legal entity exceeds $250,000.

actions.text: Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Flores.
On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enforce section 526 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007.

actions.text: Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Gardner.
On agreeing to the Gardner amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for "Integrated Activities" and to reduce funds for "National Institute of Food and Agriculture-research and education activities" by $4,400,000, respectively.

actions.text: Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Flake.
On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A057) Agreed to by recorded vote: 283 - 128 (Roll no. 454).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the construction of an ethanol blender pump or an ethanol storage facility.

actions.text: Amendment (A056) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 310 (Roll no. 453).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to reduce each amount made available by this bill by 5 percent.

actions.text: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Lujan.

Mrs. Lummis raised a point of order against the Lujan amendment (A055). The amendment violates Clause 2 of rule XXI and imposes new duties on the Secretary of Agriculture. The Chair sustained the point of order.

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to provide any marketing funds to any entity that advertises, describes, labels, or offers for sale chile peppers as New Mexico chile unless such chile peppers were grown in New Mexico.

actions.text: Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Flake.
On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A054) Failed by voice vote.

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to provide to upland cotton producers counter-cyclical payments for upland cotton, repayment rates for marketing assistance loans at the prevailing world market price for upland cotton, or loan deficiency payments for upland cotton.

actions.text: Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Campbell.
On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 287 (Roll no. 452).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount of funds provided by this bill for "Agricultural Programs, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service, Salaries and Expenses" by $11,000,000.

actions.text: Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Holden.
On agreeing to the Holden amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 335 (Roll no. 451).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce each amount made available by the bill by 5.88% and the amounts may not be used to carry out the limitations contained in paragraphs (1) through (8) of section 728.

actions.text: Amendment (A051) offered by Ms. Hirono. (consideration: CR 6/15/2011 H4274; text: CR 6/15/2011 H4274)
On agreeing to the Hirono amendment (A051) Agreed to by recorded vote: 288 - 132 (Roll no. 450).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to provide $3 million for preventive measures under the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act and the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act.

actions.text: Amendment (A050) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX). (consideration: CR 6/15/2011 H4272-4273; text: CR 6/15/2011 H4272)
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 235 (Roll no. 449).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

actions.text: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Scalise. (consideration: CR 6/15/2011 H4272; text: CR 6/15/2011 H4272)
On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 179 (Roll no. 448).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement the Departmental Regulation of the Department of Agriculture entitled "Policy Statement on Climate Change Adaptation".

actions.text: Amendment (A048) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX). (consideration: CR 6/15/2011 H4271-4272; text: CR 6/15/2011 H4271)
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 237 (Roll no. 447).

bill.short_title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
bill.official_title: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

amendments.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be used in contravention of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008.
